system.description: The character works as a law enforcement officer. They could be anything from a town cop to an agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. They have a great deal of authority inside their jurisdiction and often command respect outside of it as well.
system.examples: Nick Fury Jr., Human Torch (Jim Hammond), Maria Hill, Photon (Monica Rambeau).

system.description: The character has a legal authority of some kind. They might be a commissioned officer, privateer, bounty hunter, doctor, firearms dealer, lawyer, pharmacist, police officer, private investigator, mayor, governor and so on. This tag can be selected multiple times if appropriate.
The character is part of an organization-like a police force-that they can call for immediate backup at any time.
The character knows how to ask the right questions in the right way. They have an edge on Ego or Logic checks made when asking questions.

The character is an expert investigator, trained in the arts of forensic science. They have an edge on Vigilance checks to spot clues and on Logic (investigation) checks. If they have access to a forensics lab at the time, they can add +2 to such checks.
